Game: EA Sports Double Header- EA Hockey & John Madden Football 1992 EA Sports Double Header is a compilation released in Europe. It is developed by developed by Park Place Productions and published by Electronic Arts. It contains the two games EA Hockey and John Madden Football. Most likely released in 1992.
